mapper.sql: SELECT children.id FROM t_sys_org, t_sys_org as children WHERE t_sys_org.left_num <= children.left_num AND t_sys_org.right_num >= children.left_num and t_sys_org.id=#{ownerOrgId} order by t_sys_org.node_level ASC
mapper.select:
SELECT t_test_saas_entity.* FROM t_test_saas_entity
,() AS ownedOrgIds
WHERE 1=1
AND t_sys_user.org_id = ownedOrgIds.id
AND t_test_saas_entity.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_test_saas_entity.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.name},'%')
AND t_test_saas_entity.org_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.orgId},'%')
AND t_test_saas_entity.status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.status},'%')
AND t_test_saas_entity.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
